exceptions.exn: The LHS of seq2Rlist_bij (seq2Rlist (Rlist2seq _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment s : seq R Unable to unify "s" with "Rlist2seq (seq2Rlist s)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
s: seq R

Goal:
Rlist2seq (seq2Rlist s) = s

Premises:
Notation seq := list
seq2Rlist = fix seq2Rlist (s : seq R) : Rlist := match s with | [::] => nil | h :: t => cons h (seq2Rlist t) end : seq R -> Rlist Argument scope is [seq_scope]
Rlist2seq = fix Rlist2seq (s : Rlist) : seq R := match s with | nil => [::] | cons h t => h :: Rlist2seq t end : Rlist -> seq R
last_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 x : T) (s : seq T), last x s = nth x0 (x :: s) (size s)
size_rcons : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (x : T), size (rcons s x) = S (size s)
nth_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (x : T) (n : nat), nth x0 (rcons s x) n = (if ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) then nth x0 s n else if eqtype.eq_op n (size s) then x else x0)
last_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1) (x : T1), last (f x) [seq f i | i <- s] = f (last x s)
seq2Rlist_bij : forall s : Rlist, seq2Rlist (Rlist2seq s) = s
PCond : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> seq R -> seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> Prop
Ring_polynom.interp_PElist : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> seq R -> seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr C * Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> Prop
Fapp : forall C : Type, (Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr C)) -> seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr C)
Ring_polynom.PEeval : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> seq R -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> R
app : forall A : Type, seq A -> seq A -> seq A
FEeval : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> seq R -> FExpr C -> R
Ring_polynom.Pphi_pow : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> bool) -> (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> (C -> option C) -> seq R -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> R
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : seq A -> Prop), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, P l
rcons = fun T : Type => fix rcons (s : seq T) (z : T) {struct s} : seq T := match s with | [::] => [:: z] | x :: s' => x :: rcons s' z end : forall T : Type, seq T -> T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope _]
map = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) => fix map (s : seq T1) : seq T2 := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => f x :: map s' end : forall T1 T2 : Type, (T1 -> T2) -> seq T1 -> seq T2 Arguments T1, T2 are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope seq_scope]
RField_lemma5 : forall (l : seq R) (l1 : seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)), (forall lock : seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z) -> Prop, lock = PCond 0 1 Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq IZR N.to_nat pow l -> lock (Fapp (Fcons2 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp Zeq_bool Z.quotrem) l1 [::])) -> PCond 0 1 Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq IZR N.to_nat pow l l1
condition : forall C : Type, linear C -> seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr C)
mkseq : forall T : Type, (nat -> T) -> nat -> seq T
seq.iota = fix iota (m n : nat) {struct n} : seq nat := match n with | 0%nat => [::] | S n' => m :: iota (S m) n' end : nat -> nat -> seq nat Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
Ring_polynom.ring_rw_pow_correct : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb phi ->...-> req (Ring_polynom.PEeval rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp phi Cp_phi rpow l pe) (Ring_polynom.Pphi_pow rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp cO cI ceqb phi Cp_phi rpow get_sign l npe)
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : seq A | cons : A -> seq A -> seq A For nil: Arguments are renamed to T For cons: Arguments are renamed to T, x, s For nil: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For cons: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For list: Argument scope is [type_scope] For nil: Argument scope is [type_scope] For cons: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
interval_finite_subdiv : forall (a b : R) (eps : posreal), a <= b -> {l : seq R | head 0 l = a /\ last 0 l = b /\ (forall i : nat, (S i < size l)%nat -> nth 0 l i < nth 0 l (S i) <= nth 0 l i + eps)}
mk_linear : forall C : Type, Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> linear C
head = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) => match s with | [::] => x0 | x :: _ => x end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
size = fun T : Type => fix size (s : seq T) : nat := match s with | [::] => 0%nat | _ :: s' => S (size s') end : forall T : Type, seq T -> nat Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope]
nth0 : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T), nth x0 s 0 = head x0 s
gen_phiZ : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> Z -> R
Fcons2 : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> (C -> C -> C * C) -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr C)
last_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq T) (z : T), last x (rcons s z) = z
fct_cte = fun a _ : R => a : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
Rminus = fun r1 r2 : R => r1 + - r2 : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
R_dist = fun x y : R => Rabs (x - y) : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Rdiv = fun r1 r2 : R => r1 * / r2 : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Ring_polynom.mk_monpol_list : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> (C -> C -> C * C) -> seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr C * Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> seq (C * Ring_polynom.Mon * Ring_polynom.Pol C)
*** [ Rplus : R -> R -> R ] Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
*** [ Rmult : R -> R -> R ] Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
F_R : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req
RField_ring_lemma2 : forall (n : nat) (lH : seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z * Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)) (l : seq R), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist 0 1 Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq IZR N.to_nat pow l lH -> forall lmp : seq (Z * Ring_polynom.Mon * Ring_polynom.Pol Z), Ring_polynom.mk_monpol_list 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp Zeq_bool Z.quotrem lH = lmp ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval 0 1 Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp IZR N.to_nat pow l pe = Ring_polynom.Pphi_pow 0 1 Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp 0%Z 1%Z Zeq_bool IZR N.to_nat pow get_signZ l npe
Rgt = fun r1 r2 : R => r2 < r1 : R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
